verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Yet one <S%H259><s%> plague <S%H5061><s%> more will I bring <S%H935><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and upon Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; afterwards <S%H310><s%> he will let you go <S%H7971><s%> hence <S%H7971><s%>: when he shall let you go, he shall surely <S%H1644><s%> thrust you out <S%H1644><s%> hence altogether <S%H3617><s%>.

Speak <S%H1696><s%> now in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and let them ask <S%H7592><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> of his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and every woman <S%H802><s%> of her neighbor <S%H7468><s%>, jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>. Moreover the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s servants <S%H5650><s%>, and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, About midnight <S%H3915><s%> will I go out <S%H3318><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

and all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%>, from the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> that sitteth upon his throne <S%H3678><s%>, even unto the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of the maid-servant <S%H8198><s%> that is behind <S%H310><s%> the mill <S%H7347><s%>; and all the first-born <S%H1060><s%> of cattle.

And there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, such as there hath not been <S%H3808><s%>, nor <S%H3808><s%> shall be any more <S%H3254><s%>.

But against any of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not a dog <S%H3611><s%> move <S%H2782><s%> his tongue <S%H3956><s%>, against man <S%H376><s%> or beast <S%H929><s%>: that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> how that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth make a distinction <S%H6395><s%> between the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And all these thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> unto me <S%H7812><s%>, and bow down themselves unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, Get thee out <S%H3318><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%> that follow <S%H7272><s%> thee <S%H310><s%>: and after that I will go out <S%H3318><s%>. And he went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in hot <S%H2750><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will not hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto you <S%H4159><s%>; that my wonders may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all these wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>: and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%>, and he did not let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go out <S%H7971><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>.
